biotools.summary: MODIG is a GAT-based model designed for generating gene repre-sentation from a multi-dimensional gene network for the identifica-tion of cancer driver genes, which mainly performed three steps to integrate multi-omics data and multiple gene associations.

bioschemas.name: MODIG
